data.name: Iron Man
data.description: A versatile damage dealer with high armor and low health.

starItems.name: Iron Man
starItems.description: A versatile damage dealer with high armor and low health.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random Hulkbuster ally

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random Hulkbuster ally.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random Hulkbuster ally.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random Hulkbuster ally.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
Always gain an Assist from a random Hulkbuster ally

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Gain an Assist from a random Hulkbuster ally.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Gain an Assist from a random Hulkbuster ally.

Counterattack does not break this Chain.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Prolong the duration of all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + prolong the duration of all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for adjacent <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>480%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>480%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>540%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
Start with <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies instead

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies instead.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies instead.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>700%</color> damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies instead.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
Allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance
<color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
Allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
<color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage for each <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color>, or <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color> ally
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance

3.description:

3.nextUpgrade:

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage for each <color=#fff568>BIONIC AVENGER</color>, <color=#fff568>POWER ARMOR</color>, or <color=#fff568>WAVE I - AVENGER</color> ally.

<color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
